Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by both myself and you, ensuring a perfect match. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This represents a significant savings while still allowing me to maintain a fair profit margin. I believe this is a mutually beneficial arrangement that will not only enhance your experience but also contribute to my business's growth. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
